name: Nicolas
text:
Welcome to Epitech, the school of excellence in
computer science! We are thrilled to have you
join this dynamic community, where innovation and
hard work pave the way to success.

name: Nicolas
text:
As we embark on this journey, remember that your
mission is clear: by the end of the year, aim to
validate as many skills as possible. The tools for
your success are right here—our computers and
resources are at your disposal, ready to help you
achieve your goals.

name: Nicolas
text:
However, excellence comes with balance. Don’t
forget to eat and rest—skipping meals or sleep is
not just unproductive, it’s unsustainable. Let’s
avoid coding ourselves into exhaustion!

name: Nicolas
text:
Here’s to a year of growth, learning, and
breakthroughs. Once again, welcome to Epitech!
Let’s make it unforgettable.
